import React from 'react' import { setBeer } from '../app/beersSlice' import { Card, Icon, Image } from 'semantic-ui-react' function RenderBeers({ beers }) { return beers.map((beer, index) => { console.log(beer) return (
{beer.name} First brewed in {beer.first_brewed}

{beer.brewers_tips}

Details ) }) } export default RenderBeers;
